marklogic.body: Yanji I (a pseudonym) and moon (a pseudonym) is a pair of twin brothers,herve leger dresses, 19 years old this year,herve leger sale, I had a bright high school, culture of junior high school only,michael kors, two per capita school at home.After dropping out of two people every day to indulge in Internet cafes, play network game,louboutin, often a few days do not come home.Their father Chen is a deaf mute,michael kors sale, mother and father divorced a few years ago, the two brothers,chaussures de foot, has been living with his father in the family together, by guaranteeing for students.Father Chen did not work,adidas f50, by picking up waste for a living.Chen was very fond of two sons,mercurial vapor, two children on the Internet is not home, he often went to Internet cafes to give them food to eat.At the end of year 5,christian louboutin, Chen was diagnosed with throat cancer,herve leger dress, eating and Vomiting,coach outlet store online, pain.I heard his father is ill,chaussures louboutin, bright and bright indifferent,louboutin pas cher, every day in the net bar.The night of June 13th,lunettes de soleil ray Ban, has been in the Internet bubble and bright days I have spent all of my money,lunettes de soleil louis vuitton, have to go home.Back home,michael kors handbags on sale, they found his father Chen lying in bed,chaussure de foot, the body neck is corrupt, apparently dead for many days.\"Take him away?\"\"No, let a person see thought we were killed.\"\"It took him to the crematorium?\"\"Where money send crematory, at home to Burn oh.\"The two brothers for his father\'s death, not only do not have the slightest sad, still home Burned in the father\'s body.When they saw the fire officers and soldiers to fire,lunettes de soleil chanel, know that things have been brought to light.相关的主题文章： 的哥当即陪同张女士到湖北省中医院进行检查 ”王立东说 事发后殡仪馆的备用发电设备不能正常运行 人生若只如初见，何事秋风悲画扇。等闲变却故人心，却道故人心易变。
